projects.name: Decoditec Wearehouse
projects.desc: Created for the management of inventory data.

details.title: Decoditec Wearehouse
details.desc: Created for the management of inventory inputs and outputs as well as for the control of borrowed tools and all types of objects handled by the warehouse area, the system was carried out using Technologies such as: Express, Node JS, Mysql, it is worth clarifying that the The sample version I have is different from the company's.

projects.name: Canelatube Web
projects.desc: It is the cinnamon tube web client

details.title: Canelatube Web Client
details.desc: It is a small interface in case you need to download something quickly for computers or any device from the browser. In this project I use technologies such as: Express, Node js, Pug js, PostgreSQL.

projects.name: Teqfood UI Kit
projects.desc: It is a sample of the designs that I get for some of my personal projects

details.title: Teqfood UI Kit
details.desc: This is a small sample of the designs that you can make using an application like figma, although it is not perfect, I have the necessary UX/UI knowledge to make a functional app.

projects.name: Rick And Morty API
projects.desc: Consumption of the rick and morty api, with favorites management

details.title: Rick And Morty API App
details.desc: This application was to have more knowledge with the retrofit library since I wanted to reinforce the consumption of enpoints more since I ended up only using Volley but I decided to delve deeper into exploring other libraries in this project I used: Retrofit, Picasso, Palette I also added the power save your favorite characters just by clicking a button.

projects.name: Decoditec Transport
projects.desc: ERP for administrative and tractor parts management of the logistics division.

details.title: Decoditec Transport
details.desc: This application is an ERP, each module contained its view, its database and its specific functions and many of them were connected to each other to create some format or that depended on both processes of each module. This project was more of a company and was not half possibility of the fork so I can add it more explained in this medium.

projects.name: SendLove Draw API
projects.desc: API developed for drawing submission management

details.title: Send Love Draw API
details.desc: This is the api for managing the application for sending messages as drawings. I have some videos on my Facebook page of how I created the api using technologies such as: Firebase, Firebase Messaging, Adonis js, PostgreSQL. Everything is on the server side as well as its configuration in Google Cloud.

projects.name: Send Love Draw
projects.desc: Created to send drawing messages in real time.

details.title: Send Love Draw (Sweet Whisper)
details.desc: This application was created to send messages as drawings in real time, the application was created using technologies such as: Firebase, Firebase Messaging, Adonis js, PostgreSQL, Retrofit, Picasso, Palette, Room, LiveData, ViewModel, Coroutines, Navigation, DataBinding, WorkManager, and more. It is worth clarifying that the sample version I have is different from the company's

projects.name: Canelatube App
projects.desc: It is a small utility that I made to download music that also releases the code.

details.title: Canelatube Mobile App
details.desc: It is a small utility that I made to download music that also releases the code. In this project I use technologies such as: Retrofit, Picasso, Palette, Room, LiveData, ViewModel, Coroutines, Navigation, DataBinding, WorkManager, and more.
